1.caption_en:
A tall, narrow gray chevron-shaped arrow points to the right against a light background. The shape extends nearly the full height of the image with a straight vertical left edge and a pointed right tip.

2.caption_en:
Two side-by-side circular diagrams compare Amazon’s ecosystem in 1995–2000 versus 2019, showing expansion from basic e-commerce into services and devices (Alexa, logistics, cloud, mobility, etc.) that touch many areas of consumer life. The right panel includes a sidebar noting Amazon’s role as orchestrator/realizer and growing B2B exposure.

{
  "artifact_type": "presentation slide / infographic",
  "headline": "And platforms not stopping to expand their dominance",
  "subheadings": [
    "Amazon 1995-2000",
    "Amazon 2019"
  ],
  "description": "A comparative diagram showing Amazon's narrow consumer-focused presence in 1995-2000 versus a wide-ranging 2019 ecosystem including Alexa, logistics, cloud/web services, mobility and other consumer life areas.",
  "layout": "two side-by-side radial diagrams (left: 1995-2000, right: 2019) with a chevron/arrow between them and explanatory text in a right-side column",
  "image_resolution": {
    "width": 1421,
    "height": 768,
    "units": "pixels"
  },
  "language": "English",
  "visual_elements": [
    {
      "id": "left_chart",
      "type": "radial_chart",
      "date_label": "1995-2000",
      "center_label": "Consumer",
      "outer_ring_labels": [
        "Living",
        "Mobility",
        "Health / Recreat.",
        "Work",
        "Consumption",
        "Education",
        "Socialize",
        "Entertainment"
      ],
      "notable_graphics": [
        "small Amazon shopping-cart icons in two inner segments"
      ],
      "color_scheme": {
        "outer_ring": "teal",
        "center_circle": "teal",
        "inner_segments": "white/grey with dark blue rings",
        "icon_accents": "yellow"
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "right_chart",
      "type": "radial_chart",
      "date_label": "2019",
      "center_label": "Consumer",
      "outer_ring_labels": [
        "Living",
        "Mobility",
        "Health / Recreat.",
        "Work",
        "Consumption",
        "Education",
        "Socialize",
        "Entertainment"
      ],
      "inner_segments_and_labels": [
        "Alexa",
        "Space Travel",
        "Vehicle",
        "Pilpack",
        "Teach Street",
        "Logistics",
        "Cash",
        "Web Services",
        "amazon (shopping-cart icons)"
      ],
      "color_scheme": {
        "outer_ring": "teal",
        "inner_expansion_segments": "pale yellow / beige",
        "center_circle": "teal",
        "accent_segments": "yellow"
      },
      "interpretation_note": "Shows Amazon moving from discrete e-commerce activity to multiple orchestrating services and devices across life domains."
    },
    {
      "id": "arrow",
      "type": "graphic",
      "position": "between charts",
      "meaning": "progression/expansion from left (1995-2000) to right (2019)"
    },
    {
      "id": "sidebar_text_block",
      "type": "text",
      "position": "right column",
      "ocr_text_raw": [
        "Amazon covers with it’s",
        "offers and devices",
        "(Alexa, etc.) as",
        "Orchestrator and",
        "Realizer wide areas of",
        "our life.",
        "",
        "And increases",
        "Teor le continuously it’s B2B",
        "exposure."
      ],
      "ocr_text_cleaned": "Amazon covers with its offers and devices (Alexa, etc.) as orchestrator and realizer of wide areas of our life. And increases continuously its B2B exposure."
    }
  ],
  "source_credit": "Adapted from: Kawohl, Krechting, 2018, www.ecosystemizer.com",
  "confidence": 0.88
}

3.caption_en: A concentric "consumer ecosystem" diagram with a central "Consumer" node surrounded by service rings and labeled sectors (Living, Mobility, Health/Recreation, Work, Consumption, Education, Socialize, Entertainment). The inner rings highlight specific offerings—Alexa, PillPack, Logistics, Cash, Teach Street, Web Services, Vehicle and Space Travel—linked to the consumer.
3.caption_ru: A concentric "consumer ecosystem" diagram with a central "Consumer" node surrounded by service rings and labeled sectors (Living, Mobility, Health/Recreation, Work, Consumption, Education, Socialize, Entertainment). The inner rings highlight specific offerings—Alexa, PillPack, Logistics, Cash, Teach Street, Web Services, Vehicle and Space Travel—linked to the consumer.

4.caption_en: A consumer-centric concentric diagram with a central "Consumer" circle and outer turquoise segments labeled Living, Mobility, Health/Recreation, Work, Consumption, Education, Socialize, and Entertainment. Two inner yellow wedges, each marked with an Amazon shopping-cart logo, highlight Amazon's presence in consumption-related areas.
4.caption_ru: A consumer-centric concentric diagram with a central "Consumer" circle and outer turquoise segments labeled Living, Mobility, Health/Recreation, Work, Consumption, Education, Socialize, and Entertainment. Two inner yellow wedges, each marked with an Amazon shopping-cart logo, highlight Amazon's presence in consumption-related areas.

6.caption_en:
Caption:
A concentric-ring infographic centered on a "Consumer" silhouette that maps services (e.g., Alexa, Teach Street, Logistics, Pillpack, Vehicle, Space Travel, Cash, Web Services) to outer life domains (Living, Mobility, Health / Recreat., Work, Consumption, Education, Socialize, Entertainment); several service segments include Amazon shopping-cart logos. The diagram uses teal for the outer category ring, yellow/pale-yellow for service rings, and dark outlines to separate levels.

JSON:
{
  "artifact_type": "infographic",
  "title": "Consumer ecosystem (concentric rings)",
  "summary": "Concentric circular diagram with a central 'Consumer' node, two service rings of labeled segments, and an outer teal category ring showing life domains.",
  "center": {
    "text": "Consumer",
    "icon": "user silhouette",
    "color": "teal"
  },
  "rings": [
    {
      "index": 1,
      "description": "Inner service ring (closer to consumer) with stronger yellow segments representing primary services.",
      "segments": [
        { "label": "Alexa", "color": "gold/yellow", "icon_present": false },
        { "label": "Teach Street", "color": "gold/yellow", "icon_present": false },
        { "label": "Logistics", "color": "gold/yellow", "icon_present": true, "icon_description": "Amazon shopping cart logo" }
      ]
    },
    {
      "index": 2,
      "description": "Outer service ring with pale-yellow segments representing additional services and capabilities.",
      "segments": [
        { "label": "Vehicle", "color": "pale yellow", "icon_present": false },
        { "label": "Pillpack", "color": "pale yellow", "icon_present": false },
        { "label": "Cash", "color": "pale yellow", "icon_present": false },
        { "label": "Web Services", "color": "pale yellow", "icon_present": false },
        { "label": "Space Travel", "color": "pale yellow", "icon_present": false }
      ]
    },
    {
      "index": 3,
      "description": "Outer category ring in teal separating life domains.",
      "segments": [
        { "label": "Living", "color": "teal" },
        { "label": "Mobility", "color": "teal" },
        { "label": "Health / Recreat.", "color": "teal" },
        { "label": "Work", "color": "teal" },
        { "label": "Consumption", "color": "teal" },
        { "label": "Education", "color": "teal" },
        { "label": "Socialize", "color": "teal" },
        { "label": "Entertainment", "color": "teal" }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "logos_detected": {
    "count": 2,
    "description": "Amazon shopping-cart logos found in two service segments (one near Alexa, one near Logistics)."
  },
  "detected_text_labels": [
    "Consumer",
    "Alexa",
    "Teach Street",
    "Logistics",
    "Vehicle",
    "Pillpack",
    "Cash",
    "Web Services",
    "Space Travel",
    "Living",
    "Mobility",
    "Health / Recreat.",
    "Work",
    "Consumption",
    "Education",
    "Socialize",
    "Entertainment"
  ],
  "color_palette": [
    "teal (outer ring)",
    "gold/yellow (inner service segments)",
    "pale yellow (outer service segments)",
    "white (background / separators)",
    "dark blue (outlines)"
  ]
}

7.caption_en: A consumer-centric circular infographic with concentric rings naming life domains (Living, Mobility, Health/Recreation, Work, Consumption, Education, Socialize, Entertainment) and two highlighted yellow wedges containing Amazon shopping-cart icons in the inner ring, illustrating Amazon’s role in consumer purchasing.
7.caption_ru: A consumer-centric circular infographic with concentric rings naming life domains (Living, Mobility, Health/Recreation, Work, Consumption, Education, Socialize, Entertainment) and two highlighted yellow wedges containing Amazon shopping-cart icons in the inner ring, illustrating Amazon’s role in consumer purchasing.
